title: Research and Markets: General Lighting Market in North America 2015 Report With General Electric (GE), Panasonic, Philips and Schneider Electric Dominating
text:
Research and Markets: General Lighting Market in North America 2015 Report With General Electric (GE), Panasonic, Philips and Schneider Electric Dominating September 10, 2015 10:10 AM Eastern Daylight Time 
DUBLIN--( BUSINESS WIRE )-- Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/rm5xq4/general_lighting ) has announced the addition of the "General Lighting Market in North America 2015-2019" report to their offering. 
North America's General Lighting Market Expected to Grow at a CAGR of 2.67% During the Period 2014-2019 
The penetration of LED lighting in the general lighting market in North America will likely increase during the forecast period, as LED lights are considered to be an energy-efficient lighting source alternative compared to traditional lighting sources. They are capable of saving up to 40% of the power consumed by traditional lighting sources. They also provide more light intensity compared to other lighting sources. The ASP of LED lighting, though high at present, is declining, which further enhances market prospects during the forecast period. 
According to the report, the growing global population will likely trigger an increase in the number of residential properties, leading to a high demand for lighting products worldwide. This will lead to a high demand for lighting from the office, shops, hospital, industry, and architecture sectors. Driven by these factors, the demand for customized products based on factors such as utility, power consumption, and color will grow significantly.
